gen:link.msg:message: The dimensional breakdowns for 'Upstream value chain [member]', 'Downstream value chain [member]' and 'Own operations [member]' do not add up to the total of [{$v4}] for the element '{xfi:concept-label(node-name($v4), '', '', 'en')}' ({node-name($v4)}), for reporting period with end date [{xsd:date(xfi:period-end(xfi:context-period(xfi:context($v4))))-xsd:dayTimeDuration('P1D')}], and unit [{xfi:measure-name(xfi:unit-numerator(xfi:unit($v4)))}]

The dimensional breakdowns for 'Upstream value chain [member]' and 'Downstream value chain [member]' do not add up to the reported value of [{$v3}] for the 'Value chain [member]' fact for the element '{xfi:concept-label(node-name($v3), '', '', 'en')}' ({node-name($v3)}), for reporting period with end date [{xsd:date(xfi:period-end(xfi:context-period(xfi:context($v3))))-xsd:dayTimeDuration('P1D')}], and unit [{xfi:measure-name(xfi:unit-numerator(xfi:unit($v3)))}]

The fact value ({$v1}) for element '{xfi:concept-label(node-name($v1), '', '', 'en')}' ({node-name($v1)}) is below 0 for period with end date [{xsd:date(xfi:period-end(xfi:context-period(xfi:context($v1))))-xsd:dayTimeDuration('P1D')}], and unit [{xfi:measure-name(xfi:unit-numerator(xfi:unit($v1)))}]. The value is supposed to be reported as a positive, the sign attribute can be used to present it with a negative value in the Inline XBRL report.
